storage-facilities-description: Chemical storage facility comprising 3 x 25,000 litre tanks for drilling mud additives and completion fluids. Tanks will be constructed from corrosion-resistant materials with secondary containment systems. The facility includes a dedicated chemical handling area with impermeable flooring, drainage to sealed holding tanks, and automated monitoring systems. Staff welfare facilities include emergency eyewash stations and chemical shower facilities. All storage complies with COSHH regulations and relevant environmental permits.
